summary: The Amsterdam travel shirt features a soft, breathable fabric blend that keeps you comfortable on city adventures.
features: Cotton/polyester/spandex blend wicks moisture and has a soft handFabric has a touch of stretch to ease movementsButton placket lets you adjust the ventilationClassic fit that follows body contours without being tight
